patthana8.30:1.1_0: Naganthañceva naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nagantho ceva naganthavippayutto
patthana8.30:1.1_1: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana8.30:1.1_2: naganthavippayutto ceva nano ca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva
patthana8.30:1.1_3: naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nagantho ceva naganthavippayutto ca naganthavippayutto
patthana8.30:1.1_4: ceva nano ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.30:2.1_0: Naganthavippayuttañceva nano ca ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthavippayutto ceva nano
patthana8.30:2.1_1: ca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthavippayuttañceva nano ca ganthaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana8.30:2.1_2: paṭicca nagantho ceva naganthavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthavippayuttañceva
patthana8.30:2.1_3: nano ca ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nagantho ceva naganthavippayutto ca naganthavippayutto
patthana8.30:2.1_4: ceva nano ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.30:3.1_0: Naganthañceva naganthavippayuttañca naganthavippayuttañceva nano ca ganthañca dhammaṁ
patthana8.30:3.1_1: paṭicca nagantho ceva naganthavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva
patthana8.30:3.1_2: naganthavippayuttañca naganthavippayuttañceva nano ca ganthañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthavippayutto
patthana8.30:3.1_3: ceva nano ca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva naganthavippayuttañca
patthana8.30:3.1_4: naganthavippayuttañceva nano ca ganthañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nagantho ceva naganthavippayutto
patthana8.30:3.1_5: ca naganthavippayutto ceva nano ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
